definition.en: property for which comparability by ratio, or by difference, or by order applies
property for which comparability by ratio, or by difference, or by order applies
quantity that in a given system of quantities is not defined in terms of the others
relation of a quantity to the base quantities of a system of quantities as a product of the base quantities each raised to a power, omitting any proportionality factor
quantity identified and adopted by convention for empirically comparing it with other quantities of the same kind
reference quantity with which any other quantity of the same kind can be compared by ratio, resulting in a number
measurement unit that is adopted by convention for a base quantity
definition.fr: unité de mesure adoptée par convention pour une grandeur de base
definition.it: unità di misura adottata convenzionalmente per una grandezza di base

definition.en: measurement unit for a derived quantity
definition.fr: unité de mesure d'une grandeur dérivée
definition.it: unità di misura di una grandezza derivata
